awards:
第59届戛纳电影节(2006)
　　主竞赛单元 短片金棕榈奖(提名) 弗洛朗丝·米埃勒
　　主竞赛单元 短片特别荣誉奖 弗洛朗丝·米埃勒

writer.name: 弗洛朗丝·米埃勒 Florence Miailhe
玛丽·德普勒尚 Marie Desplechin

director.name: 弗洛朗丝·米埃勒 Florence Miailhe

introduction: A crazy day in a neighbourhood under reconstruction: seven characters and a rag doll are swept up in a dizzying chain of events. Drawing on everyday tabloid violence, Conte de quartier is a lively adventure at the crossroads of realism and fantasy. It owes its poetry and disturbing strangeness to an animation technique using paint, sand and a digital camera, highlighted by Denis Colin's subtle musical score and Olivier Calvert's sound design. The film is a fireworks display to light up audiences' imaginations. A film without words.
